Synthesis and Crystal Structure of (CH 3 NH 3 ) 2 [Cu(NO 3 ) 4 ]: a Rare Example of
a Tetranitratocuprate(II) with a Light Cation of the Type M 2 [Cu(NO 3 ) 4 ]
Georg Steinhauser a,b, *, Konstantin Karaghiosoff b , and Thomas M. Klapötke b, *
a Vienna/Austria, Vienna University of Technology, Atominstitut der Österreichischen Universitäten

Received November 14 th , 2007.
Abstract.

nitrate pentahemihydrate in concentrated nitric acid yields the
novel bis(monomethylammonium) tetranitratocuprate(II). By
